options.expand_who.description: Options - label for which messages should be expanded.

options.expand_auto.description: Options - label for automatically expanding messages.

options.expand_auto.tooltip.message: Hvis tråden er sammenfoldet, udvid alle ulæste meddelelser eller den sidste meddelelse. Hvis den er udvidet, udvid kun den valgte meddelelse i meddelelseslisten.
options.expand_auto.tooltip.description: Options - tooltip for automatically expanding messages.

options.expand_none.description: Options - label for not expanding messages.

options.expand_all.description: Options - label for expanding all messages.

options.quoting_desc.message: Sammenfold citeret tekst med flere end dette antal linjer.

options.hide_sigs_desc.message: Om signaturer er sammenfoldede som standard.

options.friendly_date_title.description: Options - title for if to show friendly dates.

options.friendly_date_desc.message: Brug "normale" datoer, ligesom i meddelelseslisten, i stedet for "i går" og lignende.
options.friendly_date_desc.description: Options - description for if to show friendly dates.

options.tweak_chrome_title.description: Options - title for tweaking chrome fonts.

options.tweak_chrome_desc.message: Reducer skriftstørrelsen for rammen rundt om samtalen (anbefales, kræver genstart).
options.tweak_chrome_desc.description: Options - description for tweaking chrome fonts.

options.tweak_bodies_title.description: Options - title for tweaking message body fonts.

options.tweak_bodies_desc.message: Juster skrifttyperne i meddelelserne for at bringe dem i overensstemmelse med den ydre skrifttype (anbefalet, kræver genstart).
options.tweak_bodies_desc.description: Options - description for tweaking message body fonts.

options.operate_on_conversations_desc.message: Knapper på værktøjslinjen vil arkivere og slette hele samtalen, ikke kun valgte meddelelser.

options.extra_attachments_desc.message: I sjældne tilfælde kan Thunderbird ikke genkende visse vedhæftede filer. Denne indstilling lader dig omgå den Thunderbird-fejl, og sørger for, vi forsøger at vise så mange vedhæftede filer som vi kan. Brug sammen med tilføjelsen Show All Body Parts.

options.compose_in_tab_title.description: Options - title for hidden compose window enabling.

options.compose_in_tab_desc.message: Ctrl+Shift+N åbner det skjulte, ikke-understøttede "Skriv"-vindue i et nyt faneblad
options.compose_in_tab_desc.description: Options - description for hidden compose window enabling.

options.debugging_desc.message: Tillad fejlretningsinformation i system- og fejlkonsollen. Dette vil generere rigtigt mange beskeder.

assistant.title.description: The document title of the assistant page.

assistant.p1.message: For at gøre dit liv lidt nemmere, vil denne assistent tilpasse din opsætning af Thunderbird for at sikre du vil opnå den bedste oplevelse. Vi vil ikke have at du bliver skuffet!
assistant.p1.description: First detail paragraph for the assistant.

assistant.p2.message: Tilpasningerne vi vil lave kan alle fortrydes, så du skal ikke være urolig: hvis du ikke nyder Thunderbird Conversations, kan vi gendanne alle indstillinger vi har ændret så snart du afinstallerer denne udvidelse.
assistant.p2.description: Second detail paragraph for the assistant.

assistant.p3.message: Dette vil tage et stykke tid. Du kan enten vente på dette vindue lukker af sig selv, eller lukke vinduet og holde øje med fremgangen ved at klikke på menuen Funktioner > Aktivitet.
assistant.p3.description: Third detail paragraph for the assistant.

assistant.working.description: An indication that the assistant is working.

assistant.review.description: The review button title for the assistant.

assistant.apply.description: The apply button title for the assistant.

assistant.settings.description: The settings section legend for the assistant.

assistant.actionEnableGloda.message: Sørg for global søgning og indeksering er aktiveret.

assistant.actionDontExpand.message: Udvid ikke tråde der indeholder ulæste meddelelser på meddelelseslisten.
assistant.actionDontExpand.description: Option text for not expanding message threads.

assistant.actionAttachmentsInline.message: Vis ikke vedhæftede filer i meddelelserne (anbefales kraftigt).
assistant.actionAttachmentsInline.description: Option text for showing attachments inline.

assistant.actionOfflineDownload.message: Mapperne Indbakke og Sendte er synkroniseret til offline-lagring (anbefales kraftigt).
assistant.actionOfflineDownload.description: Option text for allowing offline download.

assistant.actionUnifiedInboxSearchesSent.message: Den Samlede Indbakke søger også i mappen Sendt (anbefales kraftigt).
assistant.actionUnifiedInboxSearchesSent.description: Option text for adding sent to the unified inbox.

assistant.actionSetupView.message: Skift til Global Indbakke, gør visningen til trådet, sorter efter dato, aktiver kolonnen "Ulæste i tråden" og den nye kolonne "Imellem" (anbefales kraftigt).
assistant.actionSetupView.description: Option text for how the view is set.

assistant.actionSetupViewDefaults.message: Brug disse personlige sorteringsindstillinger for alle mapper.
assistant.actionSetupViewDefaults.description: Option text for setting the view defaults.

assistant.actionEnsureMessagePaneVisible.description: Option text for ensuring the message pane is visible.

assistant.settings2.message: Ønsker du at aktivere flere indstillinger senere kan du altid tilgå denne assistent igennem tilføjelsens indstillingsknap under "Avanceret".
assistant.settings2.description: Paragraph informing users of the ability to change settings later.

gallery.messageMovedOrDeleted.message: Vi beklager, men vi kan ikke vise galleriet fordi meddelelserne er blevet flyttet eller slettet.

messageBody.hideQuotedText.description: String displayed in a message body to collapse the quoted text.

messageBody.showQuotedText.description: String displayed in a message body to expand the quoted text.

header.commaSeparator.description: This is used in messages, for the recipients, and the 'between' column as well. In English, space after the comma.

header.andSeparator.description: This is used in messages, for the recipients, and the 'between' column as well. In English, space after and before « and ».

attachments.context.detach.description: Context menu item to detach an attachment.

attachments.context.delete.description: Context menu item to delete an attachment.

pluralForm.description: Please make sure you read and understood https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Localization_and_Plurals. pluralForm corresponds to the 'pluralRule' variable that's described in the page, it's just a mistake if the name doesn't match the MDC page.

attachments.numAttachments.description: The description used for how many attachments there are. This should take the form of a plural form, see also 'pluralForm'.

message.meFromMeToSomeone.description: One of four different strings are required to accomodate some languages which have specific declensions.

message.meFromSomeoneToMe.description: One of four different strings are required to accomodate some languages which have specific declensions.

message.meBetweenMeAndSomeone.description: One of four different strings are required to accomodate some languages which have specific declensions.

message.meBetweenSomeoneAndMe.description: One of four different strings are required to accomodate some languages which have specific declensions.

message.headerSubject.description: Name for the Subject header that is displayed when you click the show details button.

message.headerDate.description: Name for the Date header that is displayed when you click the show details button.

message.headerFolder.description: Name for the Folder header that is displayed when you click the show details button.

involvingTabTitle.description: This is used when we click on the "recent conversations" button in a contact tooltip. This is the title of the tab that opens.

compose.confirmDiscard.message: Er du sikker på du vil slette denne meddelelse?
compose.confirmDiscard.description: Confirmation message when discarding a compose draft.

compose.attachFiles.description: Title of the file picker to attach files to a compose draft.

compose.attachment.description: Attachment header when composing a draft.

attachments.sizeUnknown.description: The message displayed when an attachment size is unknown.

compose.sendAnEmptyMessage.description: Confirmation message for sending an empty email.

compose.messageSendingSuccess.description: Information text for email sent success.

conversation.forwardFillInText.message: Her er en samtale jeg tror du vil finde interessant!
conversation.forwardFillInText.description: Text displayed when a conversation is forwarded.

compose.messageSendingCanceled.description: Information text when sending email was canceled.

Vedhæftede filer vil ikke blive krypteret med inline-PGP.
Send i stedet meddelelse med PGP/MIME?

message.at.description: Used for concatenation of two strings, e.g. John Doe at http://bugzilla.mozilla.org
